posts.post_content:
-------  SOLD  --------

A couple of triples I have:

Fred Abbott - Excellent front with some paper loss on back (Piedmont Factory 25)
John Butler (Piedmont 350, Factory 25)

Both have some creasing. I'd consider both of these to be Poor condition but are in reasonable shape.

I tried attaching images several times, but keep receiving an error message. However, if you PM me with your email address, I will be happy to send them there
Try compressing the images - if the files are too big you can't upload them.

Thanks, Bryan - I did that but they are still far beyond the exceeded limits. When I took them with my camera, it was set to the default/highest image quality, so they're like several 7-8 MB each. Even compressed that only took it down to about half. 

To all - I'm away from my scanner right now, but a few people have requested scans. Should they still be available by later today, I will scan them in here.
Finally had some time to scan these in correctly (though my scanner is not the best). One bump to $20 (PPFF) before sending these to eBay.
